title: LF Gold Jungle/Support Main
body:
Looking to fill a Jungle and Support postion.
Wanting  players who can communicate and co-operate in a team that knows what is expected from their role
Pref Gold but silver may apply
reply below with these details
IGN-
Current Season Rank-
Previous Season Rank-
Pref Champs-

replies.body:
Gnarmy of One

Can I join your team or would you like to join mine? I am looking for long term team mates =)
